00028 bool TableIdCache::contains(int id) {
00029   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00030   HashIndex &hash_index = m_cache.get<1>();
00031   return hash_index.find(id) != hash_index.end();
00032 }
00033 
00034 void TableIdCache::insert(int id) {
00035   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00036   m_cache.push_back(id);
00037   if (m_cache.size() > (size_t)m_max_entries)
00038     m_cache.pop_front();
00039 }
